mapper.insert: insert into scrum (scrum_name, scrum_status, scrum_dsc, scrum_creator, scrum_create_time, scrum_start_time, scrum_end_time, scrum_finish_time, proj_id, is_delete) values (#{name}, #{status}, #{dsc}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{finishTime}, #{projId}, 0)
mapper.update: update scrum set is_delete = 1 where scrum_id = #{scrumId}
